#summary How to install and configure ubar.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Introduction =

This guide details the steps to obtain and configure the ubar php framework.


= Instructions =
== Stable Releases ==
  # Obtain the current stable build from [http://code.google.com/p/ubar/downloads/list Downloads]
  # Set up your project with the following structure:
{{{
- web
- WEB-INF
  - controller
  - lib
    - ubar
  - model
  - properties
  - view
    - pages
    - templates
}}}
  # Configure the *_/web_* folder to be the web root
  # Move *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/install/index.php_* to *_web/index.php_*
  # Move *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/install/.htaccess_* to *_web/.htaccess_*
  # Edit *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar_config.properties_* uncommenting and overriding default values where necessary. Note that you you will want to set DEV_MODE to true during development.

== From The Repository ==
  # Check out the source using the instructions on [http://code.google.com/p/ubar/source/checkout Source]
  # Set up your project with the following structure:
{{{
- web
- WEB-INF
  - controller
  - lib
    - ubar
  - model
  - properties
  - view
    - pages
    - templates
}}}
  # Configure the *_/web_* folder to be the web root
  # Move *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/install/index.php_* to *_web/index.php_*
  # Move *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/install/.htaccess_* to *_web/.htaccess_*
  # Rename *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar_config.properties.in_* to *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar_config.properties_*
  # Rename *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar.xml.i_*n to *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar.xml_*
  # Edit *_WEB-INF/lib/ubar/ubar_config.properties_* uncommenting and overriding default values where necessary. Note that you you will want to set DEV_MODE to true during development.
